title: FM telephones ex-diplomat Shaukat Mukadam to condole daughter’s killing
content:
ISLAMABAD, July 21 (APP): Foreign Minister Makhdoom Shah Mahmood Qureshi on Wednesday had a telephonic contact with former Pakistani diplomat Shaukat Mukadam and expressed his condolences over the tragic incident of his daughter’s killing.
He commiserated with family members of the deceased and said that he equally share the grief of bereaved family in this testing moment.
The Foreign Minister assured every possible cooperation to the former diplomat.
